**Type** Package

**Title** Nonparametric Testing for Linear Models

**Version** 1.1.0

**Date** 2022-09-05

**Author** Hippolyte Boucher <Hippolyte.Boucher@outlook.com>

**Maintainer** Pascal Lavergne <lavergnetse@gmail.com>

**Depends** np

**Suggests** pracma, foreach

**Description** The package performs nonparametric test of linearity. Five heteroskedasticity-robust tests are available: Bierens (1982), Zheng (1996), Escanciano (2006), Lavergne and Patilea (2008), and Lavergne and Patilea (2012). Specific bandwidth and kernel methods can be chosen along with many other options.

**License** BSD 3-Clause License

**NeedsCompilation** Yes
